conbody.p: The following section, , lists some of the messages that the control system displays on the screen when there are operational problems. This is not a complete list. Along with each of the fault and alert messages described, there is a list of possible causes and things to check and repair.
Only qualified service agents, as defined in , using appropriate test equipment, should perform any service procedures on the water heater.
conbody.note: If you are not qualified and licensed or certified as required by the authority having jurisdiction to perform a given task, do not attempt to perform any of the diagnostic or service procedures described in the following section.
conbody.p: If you do not understand the instructions in the following section, do not attempt to perform any procedures.
Call the technical support phone number listed on the back cover of this manual for further technical assistance or to locate a qualified service agent in your area.
